content: 10 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 12 sts round 11 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts round 12 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts *start stuffing round 13-14 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 15 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *insert eyes stuff and fasten_off spider legs make eight row 1 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 slip_stitch into each chain across 10 sts fasten_off and make sew the legs to the sew the spider to the eight legs spider web link to video https //youtu be/vt6hshmkrq8 if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
